'''Mossy stone brick stairs''' are a [[mossy stone brick]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Mossy stone brick stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Mossy Stone Brick Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Mossy stone brick stairs generate as part of [[ruined portal]]s in the [[Overworld]].

=== Note blocks ===
